description.value:
Level 3 Evocation

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: 150 feet

Components: V, S, M (a ball of bat guano and sulfur)

Duration: Instantaneous

A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning|XPHB.

At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 8d6|3-9|1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.
